                   .:                     :,                                          
,:::::::: ::`      :::                   :::                                          
,:::::::: ::`      :::                   :::                                          
.,,:::,,, ::`.:,   ... .. .:,     .:. ..`... ..`   ..   .:,    .. ::  .::,     .:,`   
   ,::    :::::::  ::, :::::::  `:::::::.,:: :::  ::: .::::::  ::::: ::::::  .::::::  
   ,::    :::::::: ::, :::::::: ::::::::.,:: :::  ::: :::,:::, ::::: ::::::, :::::::: 
   ,::    :::  ::: ::, :::  :::`::.  :::.,::  ::,`::`:::   ::: :::  `::,`   :::   ::: 
   ,::    ::.  ::: ::, ::`  :::.::    ::.,::  :::::: ::::::::: ::`   :::::: ::::::::: 
   ,::    ::.  ::: ::, ::`  :::.::    ::.,::  .::::: ::::::::: ::`    ::::::::::::::: 
   ,::    ::.  ::: ::, ::`  ::: ::: `:::.,::   ::::  :::`  ,,, ::`  .::  :::.::.  ,,, 
   ,::    ::.  ::: ::, ::`  ::: ::::::::.,::   ::::   :::::::` ::`   ::::::: :::::::. 
   ,::    ::.  ::: ::, ::`  :::  :::::::`,::    ::.    :::::`  ::`   ::::::   :::::.  
                                ::,  ,::                               ``             
                                ::::::::                                              
                                 ::::::                                               
                                  `,,`


http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:3153767
HyperPixel 4.0 Pi Case by superwoodle is licensed under the Creative Commons - Attribution - Share Alike license.
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/

# Summary

A case for your Raspberry Pi 3 B+ and HyperPixel 4.0 screen. The case is designed to use the screws that come with the HyperPixel, so no other parts are required.

https://shop.pimoroni.com/products/hyperpixel-4

__This case is designed for the Touch screen version.__

I've also provided the Solidworks design file.

**UPDATE: Now with SD card slot and vent holes!
